title: Nigeria beat holders South Africa to reach Wafcon final
summary: A 94th-minute goal from Michelle Alozie helped Nigeria beat South Africa 2-1 in Casablanca to reach the final of Wafcon 2024.

title: Arsenal close to Gyokeres deal after add-ons delay
summary: Arsenal are close to a deal for Sporting striker Viktor Gyokeres after negotiations over the finer details of the transfer took longer than expected.
